mapper.select: SELECT b.bfa_id, a.admin_name AS applyUserName, b.apply_reason, b.apply_mount, b.create_time FROM buy_funds_apply b, admin a WHERE b.apply_user_id = a.admin_id AND b.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND a.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND b.deal = 1 ORDER BY b.create_time DESC

SELECT a2.admin_name AS applyUserName, a1.admin_name AS dealUserName, b.bfa_agree, b.bfa_reason, b.apply_reason, b.apply_mount, b.create_time, b.update_time FROM admin a1 RIGHT JOIN buy_funds_apply b ON a1.admin_id = b.deal_user_id LEFT JOIN admin a2 ON b.apply_user_id = a2.admin_id WHERE b.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND a1.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND a2.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND b.deal = 0 ORDER BY b.update_time DESC
